column4: can someone please help me my bluetoth device is disabled how do i enable?
i have a pic where do i uploadi t?
if you run: lsmod | grep bt    do you see btusb?
ok does the bluetooth device show as loading ok in    dmesg | less
did you read through   dmesg |  less     it will show the device coming online and getting loaded (if it is)
use the cursors to scroll the terminal up and down to read the text
read the text and you will see your bluetooth device coming online and being installed
as well as any issues it may be having
if you use a pastebin, its a little faster than image as text is smaller in size
ya it is detected i came here yesterday for 1 hour but i dint got help
ok try: sudo apt-get --reinstall install bluez bluetooth
thats all i know dude. I dont use usb
